title: Pendant, ca. 1850
inscribed: Box says on bottom: Civilotti Roma Pa di Spagna No 939495
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: Enamel-painting of a young girl in a bonnet in a white blouse and blue shirt, holding flowers in her left hand and a jar and cake in her right.  Mounted in a gold frame with five pendants and ring, all ornamented with pearls and rose diamonds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pendant, ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Enamel, gold, 24 pearls and 46 diamonds.. Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes. 1946-50-23.
